entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 1 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 30
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 12
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING WEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 9 ABOVE
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

HIGHS 15 TO 20

MOSTLY SUNNY

MOSTLY CLOUDY

HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
